column5: Has anyone fished this river? If so, how was it and who did you go through? Thanks!!!

that river system is one north of the albany river system. the albany river is great for fishing brookies pike walleye and in some lakes lakers and whitefish. it should be just great. are you canoeing???? #####://www.flyfishontario.com/ try this out for starters good luck.
